data.actual_result: Keyboard overlaps the buttons and you cannot click on them unless you close the keyboard first
data.expected_result: Either the modal should lift up enough to show Confirm and Cancel buttons, or you should be able to scroll the modal to reveal them
data.short_description: Keyboard covers the Confirm and Cancel button on ban modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with ban member permission - Select a member and Ban - Focus the Reason textfield
